meta.job_title: Travel Nurse RN ED - Emergency Department

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care in emergency department settings, including assessment, treatment, and monitoring of patients in critical condition.
Administer emergency medicine to patients in urgent and life-threatening situations, ensuring timely and accurate interventions.
Manage critical care patients, including monitoring vital signs, administering medications, and coordinating with multidisciplinary teams.
Complete clinical documentation and maintain accurate records of patient cases and treatments according to healthcare regulations.
Provide wound care and perform dressing changes for patients with injuries and trauma.
Administer IV therapy and manage IV lines for patients in need of intravenous medications and fluids.
Utilize medical terminology and maintain infection control protocols to ensure patient safety and well-being.
Collaborate with medical and nursing teams to provide comprehensive and effective patient care in emergency department settings.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing (BScN) or related field (Master's in Nursing preferred)
